channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- HPE Performance Center
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- HPE Performance Center

item.title: CVE-2017-14359|2024-08-05T19:27:40.055Z -- micro%20focus -- hpe%20performance%20center
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in HPE Performance Center versions 12.20. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow cross-site scripting.
